code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./StatsTitle.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatsTitle=()=>{const[paddingTop,setPaddingTop]=useState(120);useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const scrollPosition=window.scrollY;const newPaddingTop=Math.max(20,120-scrollPosition/2);setPaddingTop(newPaddingTop);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stats-title-container",style:{paddingTop:`${paddingTop}px`},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"stats-title-text",children:["We ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"highlight-golden",children:"clarify"})," your brand messaging and help you",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"highlight-golden",children:"reach the right audience"})]})});};export default StatsTitle;
